definition[0]: the money that people have collected for a particular purpose
example[0]: How much money is there left in the kitty?
definition[1]: the money that the winner of a game of cards receives
definition[2]: a word for a cat, used especially by children
definition[3]: an amount of money that has been gathered and is available for several people, organizations etc to use
example[1]: The Dutch pay more per capita than any other country into the collective EU kitty.
